text: Prevalje pod Krimom (; Leksikon občin kraljestev in dežel zastopanih v državnem zboru, vol. 6: Kranjsko. 1906. Vienna: C. Kr. Dvorna in Državna Tiskarna, pp. 118–119.) is a settlement in the Municipality of Brezovica in central Slovenia. The municipality is part of the traditional region of Inner Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Brezovica municipal site ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Prevalje to Prevalje pod Krimom in 1953.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==Church== Our Lady of Sorrows Church The local church, built on a small hill called Žalostna gora' (Mount of Sorrows; ) north of the settlement, is dedicated to Our Lady of Sorrows and was built in 1727 by the Carthusians from Bistra. It belongs to the Parish of Preserje.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number ešd 2181 ==References== ==External links== * *Prevalje pod Krimom on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Brezovica
title: Prevalje pod Krimom
